title: 'Empire's' Jussie Smollett on Jamal's Addiction to Lucious, "Rough Patch" With Cookie and That Slap
text:
'Empire's' Jussie Smollett on Jamal's... 'Empire's' Jussie Smollett on Jamal's Addiction to Lucious, "Rough Patch" With Cookie and That Slap Next Story Prev Story 14 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
"He wasn't ready to run a damn company," the star of Fox's hip-hop smash tells THR about Jamal's recent struggles to fill his father's shoes. For the entire first season of Empire , Jamal Lyon wanted nothing more than his father's love and acceptance.   Hollywood Reporter.
